response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would greatly benefit you. We are offering this remarkable item at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is a unique chance to secure a high-quality product at a price that offers significant savings compared to its market value. We look forward to hearing your response.", "product_price": 12000}
